mapper.select: select * from tb_term_event where status = 'active' and stock > 0 order by discount desc limit 6

INSERT INTO tb_term_event (product_id, term, seller_id, event_name, event_info, attach_name, attach_origin_name, discount, sale_price, regular_price, stock) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{term}, #{seller_id}, #{event_name}, #{event_info}, #{attach_name}, #{attach_origin_name}, #{discount}, #{sale_price}, #{regular_price}, #{stock} )
select * from tb_term_event where term_item_id = #{term_item_id} and status = 'active'

SELECT e.*, s.company_name, s.b_number, m.name AS seller_name FROM TB_TERM_EVENT e JOIN TB_SELLER s ON e.seller_id = s.seller_id JOIN TB_MEMBER m ON e.seller_id = m.member_id WHERE e.status='active'
AND e.seller_id = #{member_id}
